FULL STACK DEVELOPER

I am a full stack developer with close to 1.5 years experience building web applications using modern technologies. I specialize in using ReactJS and Redux. I am also familiar with some back end technologies such as MongoDB, NodeJs and Express.

REACT, REDUX, SASS
